errors.name: POST
errors.description: the Power On Self Test procedure failed

errors.name: UNDER_VOLTAGE
errors.description: a voltage value is lower than a certain threshold

errors.name: OVER_VOLTAGE
errors.description: a voltage value is higher than a certain threshold

errors.name: UNDER_TEMPERATURE
errors.description: a temperature value is lower than a certain threshold

errors.name: OVER_TEMPERATURE
errors.description: a temperature value is higher than a certain threshold

errors.name: CAN
errors.description: CAN bus communication is not working

errors.name: FLASH
errors.description: The flash procedure could not be completed safely

errors.name: BMS_MONITOR
errors.description: BMS monitor communication is not working

errors.name: OPEN_WIRE
errors.description: The BMS monitor detected an open-wire
